intro.paragraph1: When I was wondering what I should do for my future career, my friend invited me to study computer science and start coding. Fast-forward to today, now I'm currently Software QA Engineer at NBC SportsNext/SportsEngine identifying and resolving bugs, accompanied by creating and maintaining automation tests.
intro.paragraph2: I've had a great privilege to work with great engineers from all sorts of background and skills. I would have never thought that a simple invitation from my friend would lead me to be a part of this amazing "Tech World."

dataExperience.jobDescription: As part of the Central Division team, we are tasked to develop and maintain internal tools and data for company developers and create web apps for our clients in sport. As a QA, maintained quality software by performing manual testing and automation testing, both in UI and API. Through collaboration and knowledge sharing with Developers and Product Owners in the team allowed effective product development cycle, pushing out better products for our clients.
dataExperience.skills: JavaScript, TypeScript, Cypress, Jira, Postman, AngularJS

dataExperience.jobDescription: As Android team's QA engineer, performed manual testing and developed automation. Using JavaScript, WebdriverIO, Appium, and Cucumber, we were able to cut down end to end testing time.
dataExperience.skills: JavaScript, Appium, WebdriverIO, Cucumber, Microsoft Azure

dataExperience.jobDescription: Receive average of 20+ inbound calls daily from customers to place orders of all types, set up new accounts, answer questions, and resolve problems that they faced. Also, helped trouble shoot software and other technological problems the customer experienced.

Interpreted Korean to English and vice versa for customers who needs interpretation services. Supervised and coordinated events and meetings for other interpreters and customers to be able to experience smooth experience. Interpreted average of 15+ hours per week during school year, and 30+ hours per week during school breaks.

projectData.title: My Portfolio
projectData.description: Created this portfolio website to show case my resume and projects. It's nothing much yet, but continuing to improve this page.

projectData.title: Stopwatch
projectData.description: Fun small project I saw on Instagram reels and decided to try it out. Created a super simple stopwatch app that measures time and also resets.

projectData.title: Expense Tracker
projectData.description: Making an expense tracker app. Thought it was a good idea to make this to keep up with my finances.

projectData.title: Weather App
projectData.description: One of my first projects to work on. It can get diverse information about the weather on the searched city all over the world.
